greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest value of gcd(2^n, binomial(n,j)) with j=0..n-1; maximal value of largest power of 2 dividing binomial(n,j) in the n-th row of Pascal's triangle.
example: n=10: 10th row = {1,10,45,120,210,252,210,120,45,10,1}, largest powers of 2 dividing entries: {1,2,1,8,2,4,2,8,1,2,1}; maximal 2^k-divisor is a(10)=8.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 23 2003
